name: Crazy Cat Collector
description:
You're trying to take care of all of these cats, but they eat a lot of food, and you have almost no money! Some of them try to run away, too. Can you build a successful operation, or will you fail your feline overlords?

Made for Ludum Dare 41, where the theme was: combine two genres that don't go together. Crazy Cat Collector is the result of mixing a cute clicker game with a cat shelter sim / management game.

Game Features

  • Feed cats to keep them alive/around
  • Kill cats to use them for food (healthy cats = more food)
  • Cats will be donated, cats will run away
  • Buy kibbles for your kittehs!
  • Buy MOAR KITTEHS!
  • CLICK YOUR HEART OUT for pennies
  • Upgrade pennies to more pennies at a time!
  • Automate your penny-gathering!
